building_information: Ellington Beach House, Palm Jumeirah, Dubai
description:
Indulge in coastal luxury at Ellington Beach House, Palm Jumeirah. AX CAPITAL Real Estate presents this exquisite 3-bedroom apartment, a haven of contemporary elegance and unmatched comfort. Imagine waking up to breathtaking sea views and stepping directly onto your private beach. This spacious residence boasts a fully fitted kitchen, built-in wardrobes, and a balcony in every room. Pamper yourself with world-class amenities, including a state-of-the-art gymnasium, infinity pool overlooking the beach, and a rejuvenating hydrotherapy pool with steam and sauna rooms. Located in the prestigious Ellington Beach House on the iconic Palm Jumeirah, this is more than just an apartment – it's a lifestyle. Direct buyers only, seize this opportunity to own a piece of paradise.

Property Details:
- 3 Bedrooms
- 4 Bathrooms
- BUA: 1781.43 sq ft.
- Private Beach Access
- Balconies in All Rooms
- Laundry Room
- Powder Room
- Spacious Living Room
- Built-in Wardrobes
- Fully Fitted Kitchen
- Reference axc-3988351

Amenities and Features:
- 24/7 Security & CCTV Surveillance
- Direct Beach Access
- State-of-the-Art Gymnasium
- Infinity Edge Pool Facing the Beach
- Outdoor Cigar Terrace
- Steam Room & Sauna Room with Hydrotherapy Pool
- Swimming Pool
- Dining Outlets
- Kids Play Area
- Parks and Leisure Areas
- Retail Outlets

AX CAPITAL: Your Partner in Luxury Real Estate. Experience the AX CAPITAL difference – where passion and dedication redefine the real estate experience. Discover our comprehensive services, including AX MANAGEMENT, AX DESIGN, and AX CORPORATE.
location: Ellington Beach House, Palm Jumeirah, Dubai
title: Exclusive Beachfront Living | Spacious 3-Bedroom Apartment | Palm Jumeirah

original_description:
AX CAPITAL Real Estate is proud to introduce to the market this unique 3-bedroom in Ellington Beach House, Palm Jumeirah for rent.

This stunning and generously sized 3-bedroom apartment is located in the prestigious Ellington Beach House, nestled on the iconic Palm Jumeirah. Designed to offer luxurious living, the unit blends contemporary elegance with unmatched comfort.

Property Details:

- 3 Bedrooms
- 4 Bathrooms
- BUA: 1781.43 sq ft.
- Private beach
- Balcony in each room
- Laundry Room
- Powder Room
- Spacious Living Room
- Built-in Wardrobes
- Fully Fitted Kitchen

- Reference axc-3988351

*NO AGENTS. ONLY DIRECT BUYERS*

- 24/7 Security & CCTV Surveillance
- Direct Beach Access
- State-of-the-Art Gymnasium
- Swimming Pool
- Dining Outlets
- Kids Play Area
- Parks and Leisure Areas
- Retail Outlets
- Infinity edge pool facing the beach
- Outdoor cigar terrace
- Steam room
- Sauna room with hydrotherapy pool

Ellington Beach House  is a premium residential development located on the East Crescent of Palm Jumeirah,  

Palm Jumeirah is the largest manmade island on the planet. This area is home to an exceptional collection of luxury villas, townhouses, beachfront apartments and hotels. The community is one that evokes exceptional luxury. The properties around here are equipped with state-of-the-art facilities

AX CAPITAL was built with a vision to create a real estate agency of the modern era where our clients are at the forefront of everything we do. With our well-defined values, we remain committed to evolving as a real estate agency, driven by passion and dedication that marks the foundation of AX CAPITAL. 

We take pride in being acknowledged as the Best Quality Brokerage by PropertyFinder. Join us by adding your listings to our portfolio and experience firsthand what we do best.

description:
Discover urban living at its finest in this stylish 2-bedroom apartment in Hayat 2A, Town Square. Offered by Union Square House, this bright and spacious home boasts a large balcony with peaceful views, perfect for relaxing or entertaining. Enjoy a modern kitchen, built-in wardrobes, and a thoughtfully designed layout.

Property Highlights:

*   Spacious 2-Bedroom Apartment
*   Private Balcony with Serene Views
*   893.08 Sq Ft of Living Space
*   Bright and Airy Living Area
*   Designated Parking Space

Community Features:

Experience a vibrant community with access to:

*   State-of-the-Art Gym and Pool
*   Town Square Park within Walking Distance
*   Diverse Range of Shops, Restaurants, and Cinemas
*   Extensive Green Spaces with Jogging, Cycling, and Walking Trails
*   Children's Playgrounds, Pools, and Gyms
*   Skate Park and Water Park Nearby
*   Modern Amenities including Schools, Hospitals and Mosques
*   A Gated Community for Peace of Mind

Prime Location:

Enjoy easy access to key destinations:

*   21 mins to DWC Airport
*   20 mins to Burj Al Arab
*   10 mins to Arabian Ranches
*   22 mins to Downtown Dubai & Dubai Mall
*   30 mins to Dubai Int’l Airport
*   20 mins to Dubai Expo 2020
*   22 mins to Burj Khalifa

Hayat Boulevard offers a central location connecting you to everything. Contact us today to schedule a viewing and experience this exceptional property firsthand!

description:
Discover urban serenity in this exquisite 1-bedroom apartment at Park Ridge Tower C, nestled within the prestigious Dubai Hills Estate. Brought to you by Hamptons International, this chiller-free haven seamlessly blends contemporary design with ultimate comfort, offering a stylish and tranquil lifestyle in one of Dubai's most coveted communities.


Apartment Highlights:


  • Spacious 1-bedroom retreat
  • Elegant bathroom featuring premium fixtures
  • Private balcony showcasing captivating community views
  • High-floor location offering enhanced privacy and breathtaking vistas
  • Luxurious finishes with high-quality materials throughout
  • Dedicated parking space
  • Round-the-clock security and CCTV surveillance ensuring your peace of mind

Building Amenities:


  • State-of-the-art gymnasium for your fitness needs
  • Resort-style swimming pool to unwind and rejuvenate
  • Dedicated children's play area fostering a sense of community
  • Lush landscaped parks and open green spaces for leisurely strolls
  • Unparalleled direct access to the expansive Dubai Hills Park
  • Convenient on-site retail outlets and restaurants catering to your daily needs
  • Elegant lobby and high-speed elevators for a seamless living experience

Indulge in the luxury of direct park access, where expansive green spaces, jogging tracks, and outdoor leisure areas await just moments from your doorstep. Strategically located in Dubai Hills Estate, this residence provides effortless access to Downtown Dubai, Dubai Marina, and major road networks, harmonizing convenience with upscale living.


As part of the esteemed Emaar Group of Companies, Hamptons International is your all-encompassing solution for premier real estate services. From sales and leasing to property management, valuations/research, and relocation assistance, we cater to your every need. Begin your extraordinary journey with us today.

title: Exclusive Dubai Hills 1-Bedroom | Vacant & Chiller-Free with Park Access

description: Discover unparalleled luxury in this brand-new, deluxe master room located in the heart of Tecom (Barsha Heights). This exceptional space, designed exclusively for female occupants, offers a pristine living environment within a 5-star building. Perfect for single occupancy or two sharing, the room boasts impeccable cleanliness and is ideally situated just one minute from the metro. Enjoy the convenience of a private window, refrigerator, TV with Netflix access, and a super-clean, well-maintained apartment shared by a select few. Experience the best in comfort and accessibility – your ideal urban sanctuary awaits!

description:
Experience unparalleled luxury in this stunning 3-bedroom apartment at Al Fattan Marine Towers, JBR. Boasting 2,228 sqft of exquisitely upgraded living space, this residence offers breathtaking sea views and a lifestyle of ultimate comfort and convenience. 

Indulge in a wealth of premium amenities, including a sparkling shared pool, state-of-the-art fitness center, and rejuvenating spa. With 24/7 concierge and security, your peace of mind is assured. Little ones will love the dedicated play area, while covered parking adds to your everyday ease.

Step outside and immerse yourself in the vibrant JBR Walk, with its endless array of dining, shopping, and entertainment options. Enjoy seamless connectivity with nearby public transportation, including the Jumeirah Beach Residence 1 Tram Station, and explore iconic destinations like Dubai Marina Mall and The Beach at JBR, all within easy reach.

Apartment Highlights:
- 3 Luxurious Bedrooms
- 5 Modern Bathrooms
- Maids Room
- Private Balcony with Sea Views
- High Floor Location
- Fully Upgraded Interiors
- Dedicated Parking Space

Building Amenities:
- Shared Swimming Pool with Sun Lounge and Garden Area
- Cutting-Edge Fitness Center
- World-Class Spa and Wellness Facilities
- 24/7 Concierge and Security Services
- Children’s Play Area
- Covered Parking
- Direct Access to JBR Walk

Don't miss this opportunity to own a piece of paradise in one of Dubai's most sought-after locations. Contact us today to schedule your private viewing and discover the extraordinary lifestyle that awaits!
location: Al Fattan Marine Tower, Al Fattan Marine Towers, Jumeirah Beach Residence (JBR), Dubai, UAE
title: Seafront Luxury: Upgraded 3-Bedroom Apartment in Al Fattan Marine Towers, JBR
original_title: Sea View | Luxurious Apartment | Fully Upgraded
original_description: Azco Real Estate is pleased to offer this magnificent 3-bedroom apartment in Al Fattan Marine Towers in the heart of Jumeirah Beach Residence (JBR), Dubai. This property is spread over 2,228 sqft and has a modern outstanding finishing.  Property Details: -3 Bedrooms -5 bathrooms -maids room -1 parking -with balcony -on high floor -fully upgraded  Amenities:  -shared swimming pool with sun lounge and garden area -fitness center -Spa and wellness facilities -24/7 concierge and security -Children’s play area -Covered parking -Easy access to retail, dining, and entertainment  Al Fattan Marine Towers is a prestigious residential development located in the heart of Jumeirah Beach Residence (JBR), Dubai. Completed in 2006, this iconic twin-tower complex rises 245 meters over 51 floors, making it one of the tallest structures in the area. The towers house 229 luxury units, including 2- and 3-bedroom apartments, as well as 3- and 4-bedroom duplex penthouses, many offering breathtaking views of the Arabian Gulf and Ain Dubai. Situated along the vibrant JBR Walk, residents enjoy easy access to a plethora of dining, shopping, and entertainment options. The towers are also conveniently located near public transportation, including the Jumeirah Beach Residence 1 Tram Station, and are within walking distance to Dubai Marina Mall and The Beach at JBR .   For more information or to arrange a viewing, Contact us today! Thank you for choosing Azco Real Estate!

description:
Cozy shared room available in a prime location! Perfect for families, couples, or ladies. Situated near Sanaya Nesto in Al Nuaimia, Ajman, and conveniently close to Hala Medical Center and Gift Way Market. Enjoy easy access to Nesto, Lulu, Rameez hypermarkets, and Day to Day, all within a 1km radius. Commuting is a breeze with quick access to E11 and E311 highways, connecting you to Dubai, Sharjah, and Umm Al Quwain.

This fully furnished room includes a separate bathroom, kitchen access, and essential household items. Rent is an attractive 1700 AED, inclusive of WiFi, gas, and sewerage. Electricity and water are also included!

For more information, please contact 0543730659.
